mapper.select: SELECT M.USER_NO, BUSINESS_NAME, POSITION_NAME, E.USER_NAME, M.USER_NAME, M.USER_ID, M.USER_PWD, M.EMAIL, M.SALARY, M.BONUS, M.PHONE, M.GENDER, M.ADDRESS, M.CREATE_DATE, M.IMAGE_CHANGE, M.IMAGE_ORIGIN, M.BIRTHDAY AS BIRTHDAY, M.STATUS AS STATUS FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN BUSINESS ON M.BUSINESS_NO = BUSINESS.BUSINESS_NO LEFT JOIN POSITION ON M.POSITION_NO = POSITION.POSITION_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER E ON M.USER_NO = E.USER_NO WHERE M.USER_ID = #{userId} AND M.STATUS = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL, GENDER, AGE, PHONE, ADDRESS ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{address} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = '1'

SELECT m1.USER_NO, m1.BUSINESS_NO, p.POSITION_NAME, m2.USER_NAME AS MANAGER_NAME, m1.USER_NAME, m1.USER_ID, m1.EMAIL, m1.SALARY, m1.BONUS, m1.PHONE, m1.GENDER, m1.ADDRESS, m1.IMAGE_CHANGE, m1.IMAGE_ORIGIN, TO_CHAR(m1.BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTHDAY FROM MEMBER m1 LEFT JOIN MEMBER m2 ON m1.MANAGER_NO = m2.USER_NO LEFT JOIN POSITION p ON m1.POSITION_NO = p.POSITION_NO WHERE m1.STATUS='1' ORDER BY m1.USER_NO

SELECT m1.USER_NO, b.BUSINESS_NAME, p.POSITION_NAME, m2.USER_NAME AS MANAGER_NAME, m1.USER_NAME, m1.USER_ID, m1.EMAIL, m1.SALARY, m1.BONUS, m1.PHONE, m1.GENDER, m1.ADDRESS, m1.IMAGE_CHANGE, m1.IMAGE_ORIGIN, TO_CHAR(m1.BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTHDAY FROM MEMBER m1 LEFT JOIN MEMBER m2 ON m1.MANAGER_NO = m2.USER_NO LEFT JOIN POSITION p ON m1.POSITION_NO = p.POSITION_NO LEFT JOIN BUSINESS b ON m1.BUSINESS_NO = b.BUSINESS_NO WHERE m1.STATUS='1' AND m1.USER_NO = #{userNo}
